name: RiBeat!
description:
Move to the beat and join Muira as he journeys to the Mirror of the Moon Lake!

RiBeat! is an isometric rhythm mover game developed for the Game Jam Plus Manila 2022. 

THEME: Easy to play, hard to be good

SPECIAL CATEGORY: Tales of Us, games that tell stories about Brazilian myths.

HOW TO PLAY

  • Move to the beat, once you move you don't stop moving!
  • WASD - To change direction
